ConfigurationOption.Value: select it.itemnum, it.description, ir.reservedqty, ir.actualqty, ir.requestedby, ir.requestnum, ir.wonum, iv.issueunit, iv.binnum, iv.location, ir.siteid, iv.inventoryid, ir.invreserveid, w.workorderid from invreserve ir join workorder w on w.wonum = ir.wonum and w.siteid = ir.siteid left join item it on ir.itemnum = it.itemnum left join inventory iv on iv.itemnum = ir.itemnum and iv.location = ir.location and iv.orgid = ir.orgid and iv.siteid = ir.siteid where ir.ponum is null

Struct._value: := query( 'Inventory Balances', 'Current Balance', 'Item = ${Item} and Storeroom = ${Storeroom} and Bin = ${Bin}' )

ViewField.Name: Current Balance
